website_summaries.verdict: Warm, comfortable heated socks that work well for many activities in spite of some quality concerns.
pros: Heat up fast and provide warmth for hours
Unisex style looks great for men and women
Wearers love them for cold-weather sporting events, hiking, and camping
cons: Some heating inconsistencies noted, including socks that didn't get very warm and some that got too hot

customer_reviews.title: SkyFox, Brachiheat, Savior, Ororo, oh etc Socks and Gloves all made by same company
customer_reviews.text: LOL, all the batteries and chargers that look the same are the same. Even if the heating buttons are different, they are the same. The four brands I named are brands that I have seen the batteries and chargers. Same model numbers, same battery approvals You should also know the same company is making the socks and gloves. They are designed slightly different, but they are being made by the same company. My advice is get the best deal in the design that you want at the cheapest price possible.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: They really keep my feet warm!
customer_reviews.text: I've worn these socks outside in 30ish temp weather and they were best ever. I've worn them in the house to and loved them. I ordered medium and felt the socks were a little snug around the lower leg and plenty of room in the foot part and I wear a womens 9. The socks are soft and charge in just a couple of hours I think. Never actually timed them.
customer_reviews.author: DEBSTER

customer_reviews.title: Not hot- just the right amount of warmth
customer_reviews.text: The first pair I received had one sock that didn’t get warm; however, I quickly received a new one and am very pleased with this item. While these socks are not hot, they provide enough warmth that my feet feel comfortable. I spent a few days in November sitting out in the woods of Vermont. I really noticed how well they worked the one day that I forgot to bring them with me; my feet felt frozen without them. I hope they last me for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Chip

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Weenies! (Like me)
customer_reviews.text: I’m the biggest weenie when it comes to the cold! My husband took me hunting and my toes were warm the whole time! Thankful for these bad boys.
customer_reviews.author: Molly G

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: These socks are great.I was amazed at how well these socks fit and comfy, they are thick enough that you don't even need to open them in the first place.Battery life is amazing and I can tell you that you won't be disappointed with them.Definitely worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Morganne Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Keeps feet nice and toasty.
customer_reviews.text: This was a very good purchase. They kept my feet quite warm and are comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Daytimeman

customer_reviews.title: They are ok
customer_reviews.text: After a while the left sock went out on me, they worked good while they lasted.
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: Use this to warm feet while TV viewing. Lasts about 6 or 7 hours before re-charging. Have not tried them with boots, etc., yet.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for cold feet!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! My feet are always cold so these are what I need. They fit Well and they are thick at the toes so you do not feel the warming wires
customer_reviews.author: Berrie429

customer_reviews.title: Exquisite and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are very powerful socks. They are super warm. These socks are very well-made, exquisite and comfortable to wear. They have very good packaging and look like great small commodities. I like them. I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Maceo Christmas

customer_reviews.title: Great socks
customer_reviews.text: I really like these socks. These socks are nice and warm! I will use them to hunt. On a cool night, they are comfortable and can relax with a book or watch TV. It is versatile and comfortable in winter. This is highly recommended, you will not be disappointed, you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: these are great
customer_reviews.text: I use these to warm my feet they do a great job
customer_reviews.author: edgar

customer_reviews.title: Hot!
customer_reviews.text: These get hot!!! Only issue at all is it’s hard to adjust temp without pulling up pant leg. But very nice product!
customer_reviews.author: tparsons

customer_reviews.title: No more cold toes
customer_reviews.text: My toes are always cold so sitting in a tree stand for hours is unbearable. I’ve many different products over the years. I used these socks 5 times this year and the work great
customer_reviews.author: Arnie  Klepenko

customer_reviews.title: I’m in the cold weather a lot as a crossing guard. They work well and make the job much easier.
customer_reviews.text: Have gloves from same company and they work well...soo I bought the battery heated socks to.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great warm socks!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable and easy to use while hunting! I bought an extra set of batteries to rotate from morning to evening.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Wall

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The socks did not get as warm as expected wearing them around the house. I assume in boots they will be warmer. They are very comfortable and you don't feel the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Holste

customer_reviews.title: Great quality worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The product works wonderfully. Heats my entire foot and provides great circulation of heat. I use daily for hunting and at work and my feet stay warm. I recommend this product it is definitely worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Richards

customer_reviews.title: Great socks
customer_reviews.text: Great socks. Comfortable and soft. Batteries last a long time. Works great in the deer stand.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki C.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work
customer_reviews.text: Batteries were charged....socks never got any more than barely warm. I returned the product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W. Warner

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These works well and the battery last awhile considering how small the battery is!
customer_reviews.author: Lowell

customer_reviews.title: Heat doesn't circulate like I expected...only on toe..burns my foot.
customer_reviews.text: Heats up on the toe only... battery is heavy on legs...and they are thinner than I expected...but my ultimate issue is that it burns my foot
customer_reviews.author: A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great socks
customer_reviews.text: I loved how soft and warm these socks are. They heat up in a hurry and keep your feet nice and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My son was complaining that our floors are freezing. So I bought these for him. He likes that it has 3 settings. And the design. I might have to buy another pair for my wife now. They seem to fully charge around 6 hours. And last on the first setting about 8 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Tobey

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer servie
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a gift. By the time the recipient received them, tried them on and decided they wouldn't work, the return window had elapsed. It's a tiny return window. Poor customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My husband has worn them once said isn't as warm he thought it should be
customer_reviews.author: Keely Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your feet warm
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves these for hunting in Wisconsin. Keeps his feet warm.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Kortz

customer_reviews.title: Good product, warm, wish batteries lasted a bit longer.
customer_reviews.text: They get warm and are reliable. Wish the battery life was a bit better, but order a second set of batteries and keep them in your pack, no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Stockwell

customer_reviews.title: Great socks
customer_reviews.text: These were great for camping! Kept me warm after waking up in the morning. Work great!
customer_reviews.author: Brunson

customer_reviews.title: Too thick
customer_reviews.text: Way too thick for skiing in my opinion. Did not use other than to try them on so can't comment on functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully get replaced or money back
customer_reviews.text: Used these socks once batteries only lasted half day on low. Recharged them 8 hours went to use them the next day neither sock works. Big wast of money. No number to call only email steer away from them.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Rhynders

customer_reviews.title: Warm toes!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband during hunting season but I may keep them foe myself! We charged them up and tried them out! My husband was worried they would heat up everywhere except the toes but he didn't need to. The toes get nice and toasty! I like them and I'm glad he will be warm this season!
customer_reviews.author: NeisB

product_meta.title: SAVIOR HEAT Heated Socks Men Women Battery Sock for Cold Feet Thermal Electric Socks for Camping Winter Footwarmers
product_meta.description:
Quality Heated Socks with excellent heating elements and imported material.
Challenge the climate,be freedom in your gorgeous life.

Item

Rechargeable Heated Socks Men Women for Outdoor Indoor

Features:

With 7.4V UL/CE-certified 2200MAH Rechargeable Li-ion Batteries.Larger capacity and longer working time than others.
Great for people with Raynaud's,Arthritis , Bad Circulation, Stiff Joints and Chronically cold hand .
3 Heat setting controller,easy for you to adjust temperature.
Use for any outdoor or indoor activities in cold weather.
Winter nice gift with elegant package,Fashion and improved quality are the idea gift for your friends and families and whomever you want pass your warmth and love.

Main Questions

●Q : How to choose the size?
A : Choose the bigger size if you have longer toe or in between size according to our size chart.

●Q: Are the fore foot and the insteps both heating?
A :Yes,Heating elements covers whole fore foot and insteps.

●Q:Can the heated socks wash by machine?
A : No ,because machine wash will damage the heating elements,please hand clean with mild detergent.

●Q:Heat socks only warm for about 30 minutes then went off when I first use it.
A: Since mostly batteries did not full charged ,so please charge it around 4 hours before using.

●Q: Do they work under subzero?
A: Yes, they do. Enjoy cosy warmth on your feet no matter what you're doing outside.

How To Use :

●Charge Up – Fully charge with provided charger kit before using.
●Plug-In – Connect the battery to plug located in the socks pocket.
●Turn On – Press on/off to adjust the temperature.

Working Hours:

●High : 140-150 F - 2-2.5 H
●Medium: 122-131 F - 3-3.5 H
●Low : 100-113 F - 6-7 H

Included:

●1 Pair heated socks
●2 Pcs Rechargeable Battery
●Dual Charger
●User manual
●Elegant Box
feature_bullets: 【Soft and Breathable】Heating socks with super comfortable, thick and well padded.Absorbent, breathable, quick-drying, elastic-thicken, use ultra-thin electric heating module.Soft Padded reinforced heel & toe accurate stitching and recessed heating element help focus heat on the toe to keep your feet warm from cold weather.

【Warm Cozy and Healthy】Heated socks upgraded to use fiber heating elements all around both fore foot and instep，the infrared can stimulate your foot blood circulation.Great for people with Raynaud's disease,Arthritis , Bad Circulation, Stiff Joints and Chronically cold feet.

【Quality Imported Material】This winter socks have long life work time with 7.2V UL/CE certified 2200MAH Li-ion rechargeable battery.Imported heating elements and quality material.It can keep you warm all day (especially for chronically cold feet), Dual cable charging system for the batteries to charge at the same time, the ease of removing batteries. Long-lasting heating, long life batteries, no longer afraid of the cold.
【Easy to Control the Temperature】3 levels setting heat controller to adjust your favorite temperature,controller LED red is for high temperature,white for medium temperature,blue for low temperature.

【High Quality After Sales Service】All our heated products have perfect after sales service support. If you have any questions about quality, size, battery or charger, please e-mail us, we are ready for personally help you.
